Title: PID for data citation
Description: Data that are accessed through the federation need to have a PID (for example doi) to support 1) review by the original data provider's team and 2) credit attribution to the original data generator (e.g., co-authorship / acknowledgement in publications)

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Formal record showing assignment of a PID (for example DOI) to the archived analysis package, including issuing authority, registration date, and resolution URL.
